# Release Readiness Checklist

Use this checklist to ensure all aspects of a release are prepared and validated.

## Code Quality & Testing
- [ ] All planned features completed and merged
- [ ] Code reviews completed for all changes
- [ ] Unit test coverage meets team standards
- [ ] Integration tests passing
- [ ] End-to-end tests passing
- [ ] Performance testing completed (if applicable)
- [ ] Security scanning completed (CodeQL, dependency checks)
- [ ] No critical or high-severity bugs in scope

## Quality Assurance
- [ ] QA Lead sign-off on testing completion
- [ ] Acceptance criteria validated for all features
- [ ] Regression testing completed
- [ ] Cross-browser/cross-device testing done (if applicable)
- [ ] Accessibility testing completed
- [ ] User acceptance testing completed (if required)
- [ ] Known issues documented with workarounds

## Design & User Experience
- [ ] UX Designer final approval on implemented features
- [ ] Visual QA completed
- [ ] Design consistency verified across flows
- [ ] Responsive design validated
- [ ] User documentation or help content updated

## Infrastructure & DevOps
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline green for release branch
- [ ] Staging environment tested and validated
- [ ] Production environment readiness confirmed
- [ ] Database migrations tested (if applicable)
- [ ] Rollback plan documented and tested
- [ ] Monitoring and alerts configured
- [ ] Performance baselines established
- [ ] Infrastructure capacity verified

## Documentation & Communication
- [ ] Release notes drafted and reviewed
- [ ] User documentation updated
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Change log updated
- [ ] Internal stakeholders notified of release
- [ ] Customer communication plan ready (if needed)
- [ ] Support team briefed on changes
- [ ] Marketing/sales notified of new features (if applicable)

## Compliance & Security
- [ ] Security review completed (if required)
- [ ] Privacy impact assessment done (if applicable)
- [ ] Compliance requirements met (GDPR, SOC2, etc.)
- [ ] License compliance verified for dependencies
- [ ] Data migration plan reviewed and approved

## Release Execution
- [ ] Release date and time confirmed with stakeholders
- [ ] On-call coverage scheduled for release window
- [ ] Deployment runbook prepared
- [ ] Communication channels established (Slack, war room, etc.)
- [ ] Success criteria defined
- [ ] Monitoring dashboards ready for release validation

## Post-Release
- [ ] Deployment verification tests executed
- [ ] Production monitoring checked (errors, performance, usage)
- [ ] Smoke tests passed in production
- [ ] User feedback channels monitored
- [ ] Incidents or hotfixes tracked
- [ ] Post-release retrospective scheduled

## Sign-offs Required
- [ ] QA Lead - Quality validation
- [ ] DevOps Engineer - Infrastructure and deployment readiness
- [ ] Product Manager - Feature completeness and acceptance
- [ ] Project Manager - Overall release coordination
- [ ] UX Designer - Design implementation approval

- Product Manager: [Name/Contact]
